tb is a collection of utilities, some I wrote, some I gathered from the community.

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Install stable version from GitHub, master branch
devtools::install_github("AlbanSagouis/tb")
```

## Usage

See `references/` for a list of functions in the package.
